channel.title: I need help getting more views on my music
channel.description: Hey guys, what’s the best ways to try to get more views, likes, and comments on my music without breaking any rules?

item.title: I need help getting more views on my music
item.dc:creator: icelight
item.description:
Auxy Discord Directory [for chatty chatty] Production Talk
There’s been a bunch of Discord Servers created for chatting over recent months, but it hasn’t always been easy to find the details and they don’t always stay active. If you have an active Discord server, click the EDIT button on this post and add it to the list. If you haven’t been here long enough to see the Edit button, then reply in this thread with the details, asking someone to add it to the list for you. > DISCORD DIRECTORY: The Auxy Collective Run by Arimyth, Hum4n01d, Ianardo, ToxicC…

Read full topic

item.title: I need help getting more views on my music
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
@Arimyth Put together this awesome guide Building an Audience as an Artist (GUIDE)

It’s not meant to be like, bible, but there’s a lot of very good advice in here. A key takeaway is engagement- which means an artist should also engage others in the community(ies) they are involved in.

Read full topic
